description:
We've several conference attendees who would show how they've used Functional Programming to do something really awesome!
If you are trying to convince other people to use Functional Programming, you should watch these demos and show them these demos.

title: Blow Your Mind with Functional Programming Demos by Conference Attendees at Functional Conference'16
